dimensions: H x W x D: 10.2 x 6.1 x 2 cm (4 in. x 2 3/8 in. x 3/4 in.)
title: iPod (third-generation)
provenance: Recieved from directly the manufacturer for inclusion in the Cooper-Hewitt exhibition, Design Life Now: National Design Triennial, 2006, before donation to the collection.
description: Flat rectangular form with rounded corners and edges; white polycarbonate face with rectangular readout screen above four circular buttons with symbols for back (two left-facing arrows), the word "Menu", play and pause (right-facing arrow and two vertical lines), fast-forward (two right-facing arrows), all above a large circular scroll wheel.
name: Digital music player
